name: Chester's Quest
description:
A chestnut-headed log named Chester and his friendly bluebird Alice go on an adventure to save their best friend Dayzee the flower!

Currently, the game is stripped down to three levels with some content unused to make it fully presentable and playable. However, nothing happens after beating them all.

Back in spring of 2017, I put so much time into this project. After working on it through the course of over a year (>60% done), development halted.

I really do intend on finishing this game sometime. It is too promising and special to simply leave behind. However, I may not be able to work on this at least until October 2019.
...and I may remake the game in a different engine.
